titleStmt.title: The Kingis Maiesteis proclamatioun togidder with certaine actis of Parliament maid anent the aduersaris of Christis euangell.
titleStmt.author: Scotland. Sovereign (1567-1625 : James VI)
Scotland. Parliament.

notesStmt.note: First leaf blank except for signature "A.j."
Signatures: A⁴, B³ (i.e. B⁴ [last leaf blank?]).
Reproduction of original in: Lambeth Palace Library (London, England).
